content.raw:
@Esteve Can you see a difference between the first Dog variable and the second Dog variable? What about the first Turtle and the second Turtle?

Also, can you tell a difference in the background color of the Dog and Cat variables versus the bigger container they're in? If it all looks like one container, then I have my answer...
